title: Sort task list by status groups with execution order
description:
Task list jumps around confusingly during execution. Implement grouped sorting:

1. Completed tasks (in execution order they finished)
2. In-progress task (current)
3. Pending tasks (in tk's priority/blocker order)

Track execution order internally as tasks start. Completed tasks stay stable at top in the order they ran, giving clear progress indication. Pending tasks below hint at what's next.
